name: Asteroids on some steroids
description:
Just a small Asteroids project with a twist, some physics here and there! You need more than one shoot to destroy the asteroids! How far can you get?

This is my first published project, as a "self game jam" in order to get the hang of things (making a playable project, upload, sharing link so it can be played etc...)

Controls:

Keyboard: Arrow Keys + Spacebar

Gamepad: Arrow Keys + A
